thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 7 of 672
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I would recommend everyone eyeglass shopping check out framesdirect.com. Their prices are very competitive and was at least $200 cheaper than my local optician shop in town. My order shipped promptly, and my customer service rep was most helpful in facilitating some necessary info to process this custom order. It felt more like catching up with an old friend than a business transaction. Thanks so much Dusty!
